document_name: Public Service Reform and Institutional Capaicy Development

outputs.output_descr: Fostered advocacy and policy dialogue in support of Civil Service Reform, financing and implementation of longterm strategy for Public Service Reform and Institutional Capacity development under strengthened government leadership and coordination.

project_descr: Public Service Reform and Institutional Capacity Development: A comprehensively reformed civil service that is efficient, transparent and accountable and able to design policies, implement programmes and deliver services to the citizens
project_title: PUBLIC SERV REFORM AND INSTITUTIONAL CAPACITY DEVT
